== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.0'
leader:
  description: The leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:
    description: The leader
    multi: true
    mandatory: false
  follower1:
    type: choice
    description: A follower
    choices:
      - a
      - b
      - c
----
